motions.title: Move Recognition Item to #2
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item #3 (Recognition of Chief Judge Rick Powell) up to #2.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of August 26, 2024 meeting minutes, second quarter 2024 budget amendment, sanitary sewer easement agreement, and multiple stormwater repair funding authorizations.

motions.title: Contract Amendment with Blount Construction
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Blount Construction for additional paving on Perimeter Center Parkway including $50,000 worth of additional paving near Hammond.
